description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Jobs' which represents a web page for managing device jobs. It includes state management for form inputs, form validation, and interactions with an API to enqueue jobs. It renders form controls for selecting protocols and operations, inputting device IDs and parameters, and displays a list of jobs. The file primarily handles UI logic and API integration related to job management.

methods.name: Jobs
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the Jobs management page with form controls, validation, and job list.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates the form inputs, checking that device ID is provided and parameters are valid JSON.

methods.name: enqueueJob
methods.description: Handles form submission to enqueue a job via API call, manages loading state, and displays success or error notifications.
